name: Pub/Sub Lite to Clous Storage
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads messages from Pub/Sub Lite, applies fixed windowing on the messages, and writes the results to files on Cloud Storage

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.label: Window size in minutes
parameters.helpText: Window size of output files in minutes, default to 1.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Filename prefix of output files, e.g. gs://my-bucket/my-filename
parameters.helpText: Filename prefix of output files including the filepath.
